name: World of BoreCraft
description:
Key Features!

  • Over 140 decisions!
  • Over 25 Unique buffs and debuffs that force you to change up strategies mid game.
  • Randomized choices so every game is unique.
  • Challenging and engaging relationship faction system.
  • Randomized events, rewards and chances for surprise results with each choice.
  • Even obvious choices are randomized in the amount of reputation you gain or lose to remain unpredictable.
  • Satirical jokes about an MMORPG ruining your relationships.
  • Also 100% FREE!

Jump in!

Play as someone in 2004 who just bought World of Borecraft in this randomized choose your own adventure combined with balancing different reputations in order to win.

With each choice presented to you there are only three possible options, and you'll want to think hard about which one you pick before moving on to the next one.

Make decisions that damage or strengthen your relationship with your family and friends, girlfriend, and work. If they get too low, you'll have to start giving up progress in the game in order to keep your relationships in good standing.

Obtain powerful buffs and debuffs which affect your reputations in unique ways, providing a different gaming experience every playthrough.

Your ultimate goal is to reach 1000 in game reputation without damaging your relationships too greatly; should they fall to zero then you won't be able to play World of Borecraft any more!
